channel.title: Learn How to read Errors HERE!
channel.description:
Getting errors in ure server compiler? want to fix them? follow these instruction and itl help you read your errors and fix them!
[URL=http://www.putfile.com/pic.php?img=4377675][img]http://img1.putfile.com/thumb/12/36317300220.jpg[/img][/URL] Ok this is a compiler with an example error... it shows you the error here...
[URL=http://www.putfile.com/pic.php?img=4377676][img]http://img1.putfile.com/thumb/12/36317300242.jpg[/img][/URL] Ok this tells you what line the error is on, if ure useing [url=http://www.textpad.com/]textpad[/url](recomended) press Ctrl+G and type in the error line it gives you.
You should now be at the line where the error occured... [URL=http://www.putfile.com/pic.php?img=4377677][img]http://img1.putfile.com/thumb/12/36317300278.jpg[/img][/URL] Ok now its time to look at what went wrong... as shown, this is my error... and to fix it i had to add "public" to "void". and in others it may show something like...
client.java:9514 ';' expected } ^ client.javaj:13670 '}' expected { ^ cleint.java:21097: illegal start of expression } ^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .
*note* to fix this, go to line 9514 and add a ; were it is needed then go to line 13670 and add a } or ) were it is needed, and if you still have errors after that.. go to line 21097 and fix the start of the expression...
Hope this helps :) ~Zezzma1410

item.title: Learn How to read Errors HERE!
item.dc:creator: @Zezzma1410 Zezzma1410
item.description:
@Zezzma1410 wrote:

Getting errors in ure server compiler? want to fix them? follow these instruction and itl help you read your errors and fix them!


Ok this is a compiler with an example error… it shows you the error here…


Ok this tells you what line the error is on, if ure useing [url=http://www.textpad.com/]textpad/url press Ctrl+G and type in the error line it gives you.

You should now be at the line where the error occured…

Ok now its time to look at what went wrong… as shown, this is my error… and to fix it i had to add “public” to “void”. and in others it may show something like…

client.java:9514 ‘;’ expected
}
^
client.javaj:13670 ‘}’ expected
{
^
cleint.java:21097: illegal start of expression
}
^
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

note to fix this, go to line 9514 and add a ; were it is needed then go to line 13670 and add a } or ) were it is needed, and if you still have errors after that… go to line 21097 and fix the start of the expression…

Hope this helps
~Zezzma1410

Read full topic
